title: My Best Science Fiction Story - Ed. by Leo Margulies & Oscar J. Friend (abridged edition) [1954]
description: My Best Science Fiction Story is an anthology of science fiction short stories edited by Leo Margulies and Oscar J. Friend. It was first published in hardcover by Merlin Press in November 1949, and reprinted in August 1950. This abridged paperback edition including twelve of its twenty-five stories was published by Pocket Books in July 1954 and reprinted in November 1955.       CONTENTS: My Best Science Fiction Story ed.
